com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb
Class AbstractDatabase

java.lang.Object
  com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.AbstractDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Database
Direct Known Subclasses:
DerbyDatabase, HSQLDBDatabase
public abstract class AbstractDatabase
extends Object
implements Database

Abstract base classes for database objects providing an implentation of the load() operation that is used to load data into or execute scripts against the database.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Brian Matthews

protected static String ERROR_STARTING_SERVER
          The message key for the error reported when a server cannot be started.
protected static String ERROR_STOPPING_SERVER
          The message key for the error reported when a server cannot be stopped.

load

public final void load(Logger logger,
                       File source)
                throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException
Find the loader that supports the source file and use it to load the data into or execute the script against the database.

Specified by:
load in interface Database
Parameters:
logger - Used to report errors and raise exceptions.
source - The source file containing data or script.
Throws:
org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException - If there was an error loading the data or executing the script or if the source file type was not supported.
